hero_sub_headline: Your portal to immersive cultural investigations. Uncover clues, collaborate with a global community, and shape untold stories.
vessel_intro_description: The Vessel App is your essential companion for the Elusive Origin experience. It's designed to deepen your engagement with cultural mysteries and connect you with a vibrant community of fellow investigators.

mvp_features.title: Theory Boards
mvp_features.description: Visual evidence mapping with real-time community collaboration.

mvp_features.title: Live Events Integration
mvp_features.description: Seamless connection between digital and real-world experiences.

mvp_features.title: Character Roster
mvp_features.description: Track participants and their roles in ongoing investigations.

mvp_features.title: Cultural Code Library
mvp_features.description: Searchable archive of cultural knowledge and symbols.

mvp_features.title: Investigation Log
mvp_features.description: Chronological timeline of clues, discoveries, and community insights.

roadmap_features.title: Original Story Studio
roadmap_features.description: Complete creator toolkit for developing authentic mysteries rooted in cultural commentary.

roadmap_features.title: Advanced Theory Tools
roadmap_features.description: AI-powered pattern recognition and cross-investigation analysis.

roadmap_features.title: Community Governance
roadmap_features.description: Decentralized decision-making framework for community-led initiatives and content curation.

roadmap_features.title: Multi-Platform Sync
roadmap_features.description: Seamless integration across web, mobile, and live event interfaces for a unified experience.

roadmap_features.title: Interactive Simulations
roadmap_features.description: Engage with virtual environments and historical reconstructions to test theories and uncover hidden details.

roadmap_features.title: Global Translation & Localization
roadmap_features.description: Expand accessibility and cultural reach with real-time translation and localized content experiences.

cta_early_access_description: Sign up for early access to the Vessel app and be part of the next cultural mystery.
